site_name: Eastwick, Development Parcel 5.2, Planning Delivery Zone 5, Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, London
description: Submission of pre-commencement details pursuant to Conditions LCS0.57 (Code of Construction Practice), LCS0.59 (Construction Transport Management Plan), LCS0.61 (Construction Waste Management Plan), LCS0.64 (Construction Facilities), LCS0.67 (Security Fencing Details), LCS0.68 (Perimeter Constriction Fencing), LCS0.69 (Highway Temporary Access), LCS0.71 (Dust Monitoring), LCS0.72 (Noise Monitoring), LCS0.75 (Impact Piling), LCS0.76 (Vibration  Monitoring), LCS0.78 (Demolition and Waste Management Strategy), LCS0.88 (Surface Water Drainage Scheme), LCS0.90 (Archaeological Works Programme), LCS0.96 (Remediation Protection Method Statement), LCS0.97 (Site Specific Remediation Strategy and Remediation Method Statement), LCS0.98 (Site Specific Remediation Strategy and Remediation Method Statement), LCS0.99 (Site Specific Remediation Strategy and Remediation Method Statement), LCS0.104 (Foundation Details and Piling Risk Assessment), LCS0.255 (Notice of Commencement) and LCS0.262 (Consultation with statutory undertakers) of the Legacy Communities Scheme planning permission 11/90621/OUTODA, as varied by 14/00036/VAR. To permit early construction of works associated with Reserved Matter Application 16/00520/REM to commence without delay.
